ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Don't let this happen to you!
ygData.msgSnippet: Thank you, Slyde.  :-) I swear, everytime I think I should unsub someone here manages to come out wit some nifty piece of info usable even at my embarassingly
ygData.messageBody:
Thank you, Slyde. :-)

I swear, everytime I think I should unsub someone here manages to come out
wit some nifty piece of info usable even at my embarassingly low level.

Peace
Evulia, casual player of 14 songs




"Daniel P.
Sniderman" To: <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
<fuzzbone@fuz cc:
zbone.com> Subject: [eqbards] Don't let this
happen to you!
02/14/01
10:29 AM
Please
respond to
eqbards






I was doing CC in the hand room in Karnor Castle - and everything's going
fine - mezzing on a 2 pull. I'm still (out of habit) playing first-person
view even thought I've heard all the advice that overhead is better for
CC...

Anywho - I try to target the add which is in view in the bottom right
hand
of the screen - and all hell breaks loose. It takes me a second to realize
that I've clicked the "Social/Abilities" box and the interface decided it
was time for me to move the box. I frantically try to figure out how to
get
it to stop - as a 3rd mob walks in the room. By the time I get it under
control the 2 tanks are dead. I get 2 mobs tied down - we kill one when
more start spawning. At this point we don't have enough firepower (2
Clerics and a Druid) - and eventually I get a string of resists to mez - so
we decide to run for the border. One of the mobs was a summoner - so only
one of the four of us makes it.

I told my guildies what happened - only to discover about the alt-L
command
to lock the windows. If you haven't done the ALT-L do it right away - I
wish I had known about it before.

Slyde Katzenjammer
53 Bard of Xegony




Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
